hanzi-su-wiki:
漆

Значения

Лак

Мнемоника

Упрощено. Жидкий 氵 лак, полученный на основе добавок 入 сока 水 лакового дерева 木.

Варианты

柒

paint; lacquer; Classifiers: 道 ; to paint (furniture, walls etc)
краска; лак; Классификаторы: 道; красить (мебель, стены и т. д.)

油漆 [ yóu qī ]: oil paints; lacquer; to paint; Classifiers: 层

purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 桼 [ qī ] the varnish tree; varnish, lacquer; paint
heisig_chinese_memo: Wall paint is a type of watery liquid used not only to beautify, but to protect items made from trees, sort of an umbrella of protection. So protective, you can carry around rice in the painted, wooden product.
heisig_constituent: lacquer, water, water droplets, water pistol, tree, wood, umbrella, grains of rice
heisig_story: Water . . . tree . . . umbrella . . . grains of rice.
koohiiStory1: LACQUER is a type of WATERY type of liquid used to protect items made from TREES, sort of an UMBRELLA of protection. So protective, you can carry around RICE in the LACQUERED, WOODEN product.
koohiiStory2: Water is falling from a tree onto the umbrella underneath which is protecting the rice underneath it. But it´s completely dry since the umbrella is lacquered.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami hits a tree and your hat protects you from the water, but the hat itself is now covered in lacquer. You take it off and see that it's shiny and hard and protected.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture your hat and all of the other things the tsunami + tree water touched. It's all been hardened with a thick coating of the lacquer.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to scoop up the rest of the lacquer water and use it on your furniture to protect it from your shih tzu (しつ). Now it can't bite or scratch or ruin any of your things anymore!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as your shih tzu tries to bite your now lacquered chair. It gets its teeth around the leg, but it's hard as a rock. The shih tzu starts sneezing and spitting, letting go. Looks like it tastes bad too. Perfect!
Ru_AutoNotes: Для записи чисел в документах используются особые кандзи, которые сложнее спутать друг с другом.
Ru_Notes:
Для записи чисел в документах используются особые кандзи, которые сложнее спутать друг с другом.
Прежде также использовался для записи цифры семь в документах. Сейчас цифра семь записывается обычным кандзи: 七.
Сравни: 膝 (ひざ、シツ колени)
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 汁 (суп), 木 (дерево), 水 (вода)
Ru_trainchinese: qī: (сущ/глаг) краска, лак; красить, покрывать лаком
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man in the tree with water (桼) uses water (氵) for varnish
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Wall paint is a type of watery liquid used not only to beautify, but to protect items made from trees, sort of an umbrella of protection. So protective, you can carry around rice in the painted, wooden product.
humanum_short_description_en:
The inscriptions from " water ", "桼" sound, " lacquer " is the last word of "桼", "桼" resembles the form of lacquer sap flowing from the trunk, the original meaning is tree lacquer. After adding " water " as a symbol.

Bronze writing is used as a place name. "Shuowen": "Paint, water. Go out from the right to help the wind and Qishan in Duling, and enter the Wei in the east. One said to enter Luo. From the sound of water."
humanum_short_description:
金文從「水」，「桼」聲，「漆」是「桼」的後起字，「桼」象漆樹汁從樹榦上流出之形，本義是樹漆。後加「水」為義符。

　　金文用作地名。《說文》：「漆，水。出右扶風杜陵岐山，東入渭。一曰入洛。从水桼聲。」

漆漆RS varnish, lacquer, paint, seven

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: The sap 氵 of the varnish tree 桼; 桼 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 桼 [ qī ] the varnish tree; varnish, lacquer; paint
①落叶乔木，树皮内富含树脂，与空气接触后呈褐色，即“生漆”，可制涂料，液汁干后可入药。
②用漆树皮的黏汁或其他树脂做成的涂料：油漆。漆片。漆器；漆雕；磨漆画(均为工艺品)。漆包线。
③用漆涂：把门窗漆一下。
④黑：漆黑一团(ａ．形容非常黑暗，没有一点光明；b．形容一无所知。均亦作“一团漆黑”)。
⑤姓氏。

漆字的基本解释

漆
qī
落叶乔木，树皮内富含树脂，与空气接触后呈褐色，即“生漆”，可制涂料，液汁干后可入药。
用漆树皮的黏汁或其他树脂做成的涂料：油漆。漆片。漆器；漆雕；磨漆画（均为工艺品）。漆包线。
用漆涂：把门窗漆一下。
黑：漆黑一团（ａ．形容非常黑暗，没有一点光明；ｂ．形容一无所知。均亦作“一团漆黑”）。
姓。

漆字的起名意思

各种粘液状涂料的通称。

paint
Basic explanation of words
paint
qī
Deciduous trees, the bark is rich in resin, brown when in contact with air, that is "raw lacquer", can be made into paint, sap can be used as medicine after drying.
Paint made from the mucilage of sumac tree bark or other resins: paint. Paint flakes. Lacquerware; lacquer carving; lacquer painting (all handicrafts). Enameled wire.
Paint with paint: paint the doors and windows.
Black: A ball of pitch black (a. Described as very dark, without any light; b. Described as ignorant. Both are also referred to as "a group of pitch black").
name.
paint

paint

paint

paint
Name meaning
Generic term for various viscous paints.
qī
1) лак; лаковый; краска; лакированный
漆丝 лак и шёлк
无色漆 бесцветный лак
棹子上的漆棹了 co стола стёрся лак
漆皮鞋 лаковые туфли
2) лаковое дерево
梓漆 катальпа и лаковое дерево
漆叶 листья лакового дерева
3) покрывать лаком, лакировать
漆身 покрывать лаком тело
4) чёрный; черным-черно
漆车 чёрный экипаж
5) Ци (фамилия)
Radicals: 氵, 木, 水  (tsunami, tree, water, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami hits a tree and your hat protects you from the water, but the hat itself is now covered in lacquer. You take it off and see that it's shiny and hard and protected.
Picture your hat and all of the other things the tsunami + tree water touched. It's all been hardened with a thick coating of the lacquer.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to scoop up the rest of the lacquer water and use it on your furniture to protect it from your shih tzu (しつ). Now it can't bite or scratch or ruin any of your things anymore!
Watch as your shih tzu tries to bite your now lacquered chair. It gets its teeth around the leg, but it's hard as a rock. The shih tzu starts sneezing and spitting, letting go. Looks like it tastes bad too. Perfect!
